header.title: Truly Memorable
header.titleText: Welcome to Apna Tent House! From elegant tents and stylish tables to comfy chairs and stunning stages, we've got you covered. Get ready to elevate your celebration to the next level with our top-notch rental services. Your dream event starts here!

features.name: tents
features.title: Tents
features.text: Get ready to elevate your event with our rental tents. Experience the perfect blend of style and professionalism.

features.name: chairs
features.title: Chairs

features.name: tables

features.name: addons
features.title: Add-ons
features.text: We've got you covered with our fantastic add-ons to take your event to the next level.

aboutus.main: At Apna Tent House, we prioritize customer appreciation and offer top-notch service, quality tents, and competitive pricing. Whether it's a wedding, birthday, or corporate gathering, we ensure your event is unforgettable with our elegant marquees and sturdy A Frames. We source only the finest tents and accessories, and genuinely care about making your celebration truly memorable. Contact us today!

faq.question: What is the Customers responsibilities?
faq.answer: The customer's responsibility is to make sure all the items rented are brought back in the same shape it was taken. The linen on the tables should be shaken off and placed back how they were provided.

faq.question: Do we set up the tables and chairs?
faq.answer: Apna Tent House and Party Rentals set up tents, stages, dance floors, and large equipment. There is an additional fee for set up tables, chairs, linen, etc. The customer must inform 48 hours in advance if setup is required from Apna Tent House. Otherwise, items will be stacked and placed in neat order for them to set up. If the customer is asked to have the items placed the same way as delivered or otherwise, we will charge an additional fee to pick them up.

faq.question: Do we charge delivery or pick-up fees?
faq.answer: Delivery is available to all of our customers for an additional cost. The delivery charges are based on location and are delivered during the office hours of 8:00 am to 7:00 pm. These charges are for door-to-door service with access for the delivery driver to drop off.

faq.question: Do I need a tent permit for the booking?
faq.answer: The tent permit is solely the customer's responsibility. Apna Tent House doesnâ€™t provide any tent permits. We can provide the information regarding the tent to help with the process.

faq.question: What should the customer do before we arrive?
faq.answer: The customers should have all the furniture, patio furniture, etc removed before arrival at Apna Tent House. The customer should make sure to have the lawn mowed and have the site cleared for proper setup. The customer should have a spot available for the delivery truck to park and set up.

faq.question: When and how do you pay?
faq.answer: Apna Tent House requires a 50% deposit to confirm the booking. 20% of the deposit is non-refundable. The remaining balance will be collected a full week prior to the event. Any cancellation must be told 14 business days before to receive any deposit back. Any cancellations less than 14 business will result in no deposit being returned. We receive payment in cash, cheque or e-transfer.

faq.question: How does the quotation work?
faq.answer: All pricing provided by Apna Tent House is valid for 3 days any inquiries for pricing after the 3 days will require a new quotation. All items are charged regardless if the item is used or not. Any cancellation must be told 14 business days before receiving any deposit back. Any cancellations less than 14 business will result in no deposit being returned. We receive payment in cash, cheque, or e-transfer.

faq.question: How do we know what size tent we need and what options we have?
faq.answer: The customer should have the length and width where they would need a tent for a quotation. An Apna Tent House employee can provide a quote for the different options we carry for the size required.

items.name: Chiavari Chair
items.text: Chiavari chairs, known for their elegance, feature slender, curved frames typically crafted from high-quality wood like beech or mahogany, making them a timeless seating option for upscale events, adding sophistication and charm to any venue.

items.name: Plain Chair
items.text: A plain white chair features a sturdy metal frame with a plastic back and seat, offering a versatile and timeless aesthetic suitable for various events such as birthday parties, weddings, and exhibitions.

items.name: Garden Padded Chair
items.text: Our garden padded chairs combine comfort and style with a sturdy metal frame and padded seats, perfect for outdoor events like weddings and garden parties, offering both durability and elegance amidst natural surroundings.

items.name: Fan Back Chair
items.text: A fanback chair boasts a unique curved backrest design for ergonomic comfort, constructed from durable materials like resin or plastic, ideal for both indoor and outdoor events, blending style with practicality effortlessly.

items.name: Round Table
items.text: White round tables provide versatile and sleek surfaces for events, offering ample space and a modern aesthetic for dining, meetings, or displays at weddings, corporate functions, or social gatherings.

items.name: Rectangle Table
items.text: Rectangle tables provide ample and versatile surfaces for various events, offering practicality and a classic aesthetic, ideal for dining, meetings, or displays at weddings, corporate functions, or social gatherings.

items.name: Buffet Table
items.text: A buffet table is a long surface for serving food and drinks, designed with multiple levels or shelves for easy access, ideal for self-service dining at events like parties or receptions.

items.name: Cocktail Table
items.text: A cocktail table is a tall, slender table for serving drinks and snacks at events, encouraging standing or casual mingling, ideal for cocktail parties and social gatherings.

items.name: Wooden Dance Floor
items.text: A wooden dance floor offers a stylish and sturdy surface for dancing at events, enhancing weddings, parties, and celebrations with its elegance and durability.

items.name: Click-in Dance Floor
items.text: A click-in dance floor is a portable and easy-to-assemble flooring solution for events, with interlocking panels that require no tools or adhesives, providing a stable surface for dancing at weddings, parties, and gatherings.

items.name: Turf Flooring 12ft x 20ft
items.text: A turf floor is synthetic grass flooring for outdoor events, offering a natural look and easy installation, perfect for weddings, festivals, and other outdoor occasions.

items.name: Stage 4ft x 4ft
items.text: A click-in stage is a portable and tool-free assembly system with interlocking panels, providing a sturdy platform for performances and events indoors or outdoors.

items.name: LED Bar
items.text: An LED bar is a modern, illuminated serving counter for beverages at events, featuring customizable lighting effects for ambiance enhancement.

items.name: Pop-up Tent
items.text: A pop-up tent provides instant shelter with easy setup, ideal for outdoor events, featuring ventilation and waterproofing for convenience and comfort.

items.name: Marquee Tent
items.text: A marquee tent, renowned for its elegance and versatility, offers grand and spacious shelter, ensuring unforgettable experiences for weddings, extravagant parties, and prestigious corporate functions.

items.name: Frame Tent
items.text: A frame tent, supported by a rigid framework and lacking center poles, offers versatile and unobstructed shelter for events like weddings and exhibitions, accommodating various layouts and configurations.
